alert.note: Alert for Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 3:02PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of southwestern Cape May County through 330 PM EST... At 301 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers with isolated thunderstorms 9 miles northwest of North Cape May, or 13 miles northwest of Cape May, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape May, North Wildwood, Wildwood Crest, Sea Isle City, Avalon, West Cape May, Stone Harbor, Cape May Court House, Scotch Bonnet, Diamond Beach, Green Creek, Goshen, Rio Grande, North Cape May, Villas, West Wildwood, Erma and Whitesboro-Burleigh. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 0 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic Coastal Cape May; Cape May
